fr:title.text: Completely distributive complete Boolean algebras are powersets

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Completely distributive complete Boolean algebras are powersets

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: Every completely distributive complete Boolean algebra is isomorphic to the set algebra of a powerset, and homomorphisms are given by inverse image map.
